data.text: @fadeawaydamaris Uggghh nose bleeds are not fun.
@Linda161879 Linda the frost free days here are around 280 days. I do not need to be working in the garden year round. That 2 to 3 month break makes me happy to see Spring.
@Linda161879 Everytime that I plant cucumbers I think of it. The drawing in my mind is the side of a house with a vague brown animal standing on two legs looking through the glass tops to the boxes.
@ScottWGonzalez I know 😃 there are so many different kind of green house
@Linda161879 I recall reading in a kids book about mini greenhouse things for cucumbers. They looked like raised beds with a slanted glass cover that was on a hinge so could be opened.
@ScottWGonzalez That is true, we talked about a green house for the weekend house, but it's a lot of money and we can't go every weekend
@Linda161879 We are supposed to get some rain this week. I like the long growing season I also like a bit of Winter. Can't really have both without a green house.
@ScottWGonzalez We have like 5cm snow 😠 I want spring
@Linda161879 Here it is from a week or so ago. Radish front and center, sunflower to the right, and most of the ones that are blurry are crimson clover. https://t.co/8ULA9Ownb4
